fields.name: Name (first, middle initial, and last name)
fields.description: Complete and fully spelled names when possible

fields.name: Email Address
fields.description: Enter the desired email address.  The format is *First_Name@catalystforchange.org*

fields.name: Title or Position for the employee
fields.description: This will be used for the Signature in Email for the employee.

fields.name: Office Phone Number
fields.description: Enter the office phone number if known.

fields.name: Cell Phone Number
fields.description: Enter the users cell phone number

fields.name: Office Location - For use with email signature
fields.description: This will be used for the Signature in the Email for the employee.

fields.name: Start Date
fields.description: Enter the expected start date for the employee.

fields.name: What Group for Folder Access should they be in
fields.description: Select the desired group or groups

fields.name: What Email Distribution Group should they be in.
fields.description: Select the desired group or groups

fields.name: Does this user need an Adobe Pro License?
fields.description: Do we need to order an Adobe license for this user?

fields.name: Do they need a Windows Laptop?
fields.description: Does the new employee need a Windows laptop and or a Chromebook laptop

fields.name: Additional Hardware Needed
fields.description: If there is additional hardware needed please enter it here.

fields.name: Mailing Address for equipment
fields.description: This will be used to mail equipment to if needed.

fields.name: Is there any other information you would like to add?
fields.description: Add any other information that we should have for this new employee
